DataElement.preferredName: Repeat Prostate Biopsy Assessment Count Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The categorical response regarding the number of times a pathological specimen from the gland in the male reproductive system, prostate, has been removed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Make or do or perform again._A gland in the male reproductive system just below the bladder. It surrounds part of the urethra, the canal that empties the bladder. It produces a fluid that forms part of semen. (NCI-GLOSS)_Removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Make or do or perform again.:The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system.  It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra.  The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.

Concepts.definition: Make or do or perform again.

The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.

Property.preferredDefinition: Removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body._To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity._A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Less Than or Equal To Two
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest is smaller than the other object in one of these ways.: A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.
